raw_comment:
Up Up and Away!!1
the first i notice is the accending from the lower states upward. 
I do notice that there seems to be a belt in the western states seems out of place. The changing of the graph seems to be starting with the warming of the weather starting in the lower warmer states.
ace_sentences: The first thing that I notice is an ascending trend from the lower states upward.
There seems to be a belt in the western states.
This belt seems out of place.
The change in the graph seems to start with the warming of the weather.
The warming of the weather seems to start in the lower warmer states.
